title: Which is the best child plan to invest in? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best way to pick the best child investment plans is by considering the dreams and future plans of your child. Next, add inflation and calculate the total amount. To know how much to invest every year, spread the entire amount calculated across the years left for your child to go to college. Most of you might think of all the high-risk investment options to get the best returns. However, if you are a risk-averse person, then insurance plans are the best way to save for your child future plan. For my daughter, a friend recommended opting for Exide insurance for my investment. After a lot of research, I shortlisted a few plans that served my purpose and I have listed down the same to help you come up with a decision as well. Exide Life New Creating Life Insurance Plans – This child investment plan is a life insurance policy that will secure your child’s dreams even when you are not around. There are two subcategories under this plan. Exide Life New Creating Life Plus – In this plan, you can pay a limited number of premiums and get an additional 10% when your child needs the funds for his/her education. In case of any unforeseen event, your family receives the entire sum assured without having to pay the left-over premiums.Exide Life New Creating Life Regular Pay – This is the same as the above policy with only difference in premium payments. This policy allows you to invest until the policy expires.Exide Life Mera Ashirwad – This policy just like the previous one assures you a life cover to fulfill your child’s dreams even when you are not around. Some of the signature benefits of this policy are no tax liability for maturity amount, flexibility to get periodic payouts, and waiver on premiums. Take a look at Exide Life Insurance plans that are specifically designed to save for your child’s future.
